name: MatheTacticians
description:
My first relatively complete game, made using GB Studio.

I will probably update this at some point with additional math-based games (this was the best one that fit my Education degree assignment lol). All visuals, sounds and programming are original. Let me know if you find any bugs!

HOW TO PLAY:

A (Z key) : Select/Drop Corner, Roll Die
Start (Enter key): Finish your turn
Arrows to move cursor

First, roll the die! You must move that number of spaces (with one or both corners). Earn points for the area you cover between your two corners, but only if the area is divisibly by your die roll. Points are deducted for overlap between players. First to 50 wins!
